Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the `Contact` resource, such as `arn:aws:ssm-contacts:us-west-2:123456789012:contact/contactalias` .

ChannelId.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the contact channel.

RetryIntervalInMinutes.description: The number of minutes to wait before retrying to send engagement if the engagement initially failed.

ChannelTargetInfo.description: Information about the contact channel that Incident Manager uses to engage the contact.

ContactId.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the contact.

IsEssential.description: A Boolean value determining if the contact's acknowledgement stops the progress of stages in the plan.

ContactTargetInfo.description: The contact that Incident Manager is engaging during an incident.

DurationInMinutes.description: The time to wait until beginning the next stage. The duration can only be set to 0 if a target is specified.

RotationIds.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the on-call rotations associated with the plan.

Targets.description: The contacts or contact methods that the escalation plan or engagement plan is engaging.

Stage.description: The `Stage` property type specifies a set amount of time that an escalation plan or engagement plan engages the specified contacts or contact methods.

ChannelTargetInfo.description: Information about the contact channel that Incident Manager engages.

ContactTargetInfo.description: The contact that Incident Manager is engaging during an incident.

Targets.description: The contact or contact channel that's being engaged.

description: The `AWS::SSMContacts::Contact` resource specifies a contact or escalation plan. Incident Manager contacts are a subset of actions and data types that you can use for managing responder engagement and interaction.

Alias.description: The unique and identifiable alias of the contact or escalation plan.

DisplayName.description: The full name of the contact or escalation plan.

Plan.description: A list of stages. A contact has an engagement plan with stages that contact specified contact channels. An escalation plan uses stages that contact specified contacts.

Type.description:
The type of contact.

- `PERSONAL` : A single, individual contact.
- `ESCALATION` : An escalation plan.
- `ONCALL_SCHEDULE` : An on-call schedule.
